content.text: Tokijiro is a resident of the Flower Capital in Wano Country. He once possessed the blueprints to Kaido's fortress on Onigashima.
Tokijiro is a youthful-looking man with light hair that sticks up in the front and has a topknot in the back. He wears a dark kimono with swirl patterns on it.
Little is known about Tokijiro's personality, but he was polite enough to tell Franky what he had done with the Onigashima blueprints.

At some point in the past, Tokijiro acquired the blueprints for Kaido's fortress on Onigashima from the geisha Kisegawa through unknown means. However, Rakuda then told Tokijiro that they would sell for a lot of money and then gained possession of the blueprints.
Franky came to visit Tokijiro to look for the blueprints, and Tokijiro explained how he had gained and lost possession of them.

elements.text: ↑  One Piece Manga — Vol. 92 Chapter 929 (p. 7), Tokijiro makes his debut.
